channel.title: Need 508 help please :)
channel.description:
Well, i really have try'd to get a 508 server, i download the client, the server and the cache, i instal de cache but when i open de "run.bat" i get this
That it means in english: Cannot find Path specified.
Well, a lot of ppl tell me to right click on the "Compiler".bat Go to Edit. and you will see like JDK1 6.0_10\Bin, change that 10, to your Java version on your computer. and do the same thing for the "Run".bat
But i cant find my JDK version, i have instal JDK 5 but when i change it it do the same... Can somebody tell me how to do it or tell me any post that say it.
Thanks!

item.title: Need 508 help please :)
item.dc:creator: @alfamin alfamin
item.description:
@alfamin wrote:

I[quote=“pingueple, post:1, topic:254799”]download the new jdk; 6 update 11 and it should work =)

edit; remember to edit this JDK1 6.0_10\Bin, to JDK1 6.0_11\Bin, and edit the classpath & path[/quote]

I got a problem, i just do what you say but i still being the same. Wat can i do? can you tell me how to do it all from the first?

Thanks :)!

Read full topic

item.title: Need 508 help please :)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Change the path in the batch file.

Read full topic
